name: The Gradient Pearl
description: The Gradient Pearl is a legendary Pirate ship that sails the Seven Seas. Captain Rajovenko leads with a drink can in his hand.

name: The Golden Marauder
description: The Golden Marauder is a fearsome Pirate ship known for its speed and agility. Captain Blackbeard commands the crew with an iron fist.

name: The Crimson Raider
description: The Crimson Raider is a legendary Pirate ship that strikes fear into the hearts of its enemies. Captain Scarlet leads the crew with unmatched bravery.
